product_name: Charlotte TilburyTravel Size Magic Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid
summary: SummaryCharlotte Tilbury's Magic Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid is a visibly age-defying moisturizer with hyaluronic acid to plump the look of skin and diminish the look of wrinkles, leaving your complexion visibly glowing and prepped for flawless makeup.
details: DetailsBenefitsMeet the product that started it all. Frustrated by moisturizers that didn't provide a glowing base, Charlotte created her own to quickly transform model and celebrity skin.The formula floods skin with moisture, making it look plumper and smoother for a visible transformation rapidly and over time.Key IngredientsHyaluronic Acid: Moisturizes skin's outer layers for up to 24 hours for a softer, smoother, plumper look and feel.Vitamins C and E: Visibly brighten and even skin tone while fighting dullness.Bionymph Peptide Complex: Diminishes the appearance of wrinkles and visibly improves skin's smoothness.Research ResultsResearched Results:3x hydration in 1 hour*Wrinkles appear 2x reduced in 8 weeks*94% agree foundation lasts longer**98% agree creasing is reduced***In a clinical trial on 29 people over 8 weeks**Independent user trial on over 120 people, 12 hrs after application of Magic Cream and FoundationItem 2619312How To UseTo visibly boost your complexion:Starting from your lower cheeks, sweep cream out and up.Tap your fingertips across your cheeks, avoiding your eye contour.To visibly define your contours:Use your fingers to smooth outward and upward beneath your cheekbones.To visibly define your jawline:Gently pinch your chin with your fingers, moving up your jawline in one sweeping motion.To smooth the appearance of your forehead:Starting in the middle of your forehead, massage in circular motions, moving out toward your temples.Pat any excess product in with your ring finger.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Olus Oil/Vegetable Oil/Huile V√©g√©tale, Isononyl Isononanoate, Cetyl Alcohol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Polyester-7, Phenoxyethanol, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Steareth-21, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Carbomer, Dimethiconol, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Chlorphenesin, Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Hydrolyzed Viola Tricolor Extract, Allantoin, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Disodium EDTA, Tocopheryl Acetate, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Michelia Alba Leaf Oil, Sodium Lactate, Coco-Glucoside, PEG-8, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Plumeria Rubra Flower Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Citric Acid, Nicotiana Sylvestris Leaf Cell Culture, Linalool, Citronellol, Geraniol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: To visibly boost your complexion:Starting from your lower cheeks, sweep cream out and up.Tap your fingertips across your cheeks, avoiding your eye contour.To visibly define your contours:Use your fingers to smooth outward and upward beneath your cheekbones.To visibly define your jawline:Gently pinch your chin with your fingers, moving up your jawline in one sweeping motion.To smooth the appearance of your forehead:Starting in the middle of your forehead, massage in circular motions, moving out toward your temples.Pat any excess product in with your ring finger.

reviews.headline: I bought the full size
reviews.comments: Worth every penny

reviews.headline: Scent way too strong
reviews.comments: I was very disappointed with this product. I truly don't believe facial products, especially moisturizers which remain on skin for a longer period of time, should have such strong, perfume-like fragrances/scents. I found this extremely objectionable.  Sorry

reviews.headline: A miracle in a jar
reviews.comments: This moisturizer is amazing.    It really is magic.   I will buy this again and again and also get a a gift for my sister

reviews.headline: l can buy this product again
reviews.comments: l love it

reviews.headline: I would buy this again and already have.
reviews.comments: I needed a moisturizer than could tackle my very dry skin and this is it.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Great product

reviews.headline: Nothing special for its price
reviews.comments:
Its a decent moisturizer thats true. It feels very hydrating and creamy on my dry skin, however it doesnt feel like it gets absorbed easier. If you have oily skin you may not like the thick and shiny finish that stays on pretty much forever. 

On the side note, there is literally no difference between the before and after photo for wrinkle reduction‚Ä¶not sure what its trying to show LOL, I sure didn't see major changes on my skin.

reviews.headline: good over all!
reviews.comments: the product is very hydrating and great for the winter. downside is that it leaks a little bit.

reviews.headline: Would Buy this Again!
reviews.comments: My first time ever trying this moisturizer and I use it before putting on my makeup and I definitely see a big difference in my complexion and overall look of my skin! Absolutely love and the travel size is perfect for me!

reviews.headline: Soooo creamy
reviews.comments: I was looking for a product that would give me thick and creamy and this one does just that! Need to use a very little amount to get the job done! Not greater clogging at all!

reviews.headline: Definitely, I will buy again üëå
reviews.comments: üëçüëå

reviews.headline: Great product but pricey
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this cream! It's kinda pricey especially for such a small container but overall it works great :)

reviews.headline: Just ok
reviews.comments: This product is not magic. It's an OK moisturizer. Doesn't really have any pleasant or offensive smell. May have made my face slightly softer, I didn't notice any improvement and wrinkles. My main issue is the cost and also the travel sized container would require you to bring Q-tips or an applicator with you. You can't fit even a finger into the tiny opening to get the product out. Will use what I have, but wouldn't buy again.

reviews.headline: I wouldn't buy again
reviews.comments: I wouldn't buy again- it was super annoying because of the pilling.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I was looking forward to try this product. The sales associate said product was great!! Well, 2 jars down and still waiting for something. I'm very savvy about my facial products, but this didn't show anything. This is just my opinion for myself. Hopefully someone else will have better results.

reviews.headline: Definitely will buy again
reviews.comments: Goes on smooth and keeps skin plump and moisturized.

reviews.headline: I would buy again for sure.
reviews.comments: The charlotte's magic cream is amazing product.  Your face will look and feel younger smoother and with less wrinkle's. Also, using this product your foundation will go on so much smoother looking. I would highly recommend using and you will love it.

reviews.headline: Makes my face look and feel silky smooth. I love it!
reviews.comments: It makes my skin look and feel silky smooth.

reviews.headline: My everyday go to!
reviews.comments: I had seen someone use this cream on a make up tutorial to help with creasing with make up. I bought the sample size and have been using it every day for a month now and I had to buy a second one because it worked so well for moisturizing my skin for context I am in my late 30s and I have combinational skin, I do not get any breakouts from using this and it really offers a great boost and moisture. I would highly recommend it.

reviews.headline: LOVE THIS PRODUCT SO MUCH!
reviews.comments: Purchased this product on a whim because it was near the checkout counter. I am so glad that I did. I absolutely love this moisturizer. I have seen a change in the brightness of my skin and evenness as well within the first few days of using it. 5 STARS.

faceoff_positive.comments: After I purchased the mini lipliner and gloss, i bought the travel size magic cream. I am 60 plus and always love to keep my skin moisturized. Face, neck and body is a must. This face/neck cream goes on like velvet, my skin feels right away softer and fuller. This is my fourth day and love it very much. It is on the pricey side, but i use little and it covers my face completely. The neck needs a small amount and i apply it were i see lines, which disappear little already. This little jar is a wonder for the skin. Our skin nedds help when we turn 30, so dont wait to get wrinkles and start to take care of your skin. This magic moisturizer delivers and i will get me the full size, maybe a mother's day wish?
faceoff_positive.headline: Magic Cream Moisturizer!

faceoff_negative.comments:
Its a decent moisturizer thats true. It feels very hydrating and creamy on my dry skin, however it doesnt feel like it gets absorbed easier. If you have oily skin you may not like the thick and shiny finish that stays on pretty much forever. 

On the side note, there is literally no difference between the before and after photo for wrinkle reduction‚Ä¶not sure what its trying to show LOL, I sure didn't see major changes on my skin.
faceoff_negative.headline: Nothing special for its price

rollup.name: Travel Size Magic Cream Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid
